title: Flash Video Downloader v3.9.3 for Firefox, Youtube working as it
description:
This is for you who just got pissed off!!! when Flash Video Downloader extension in Firefox just suddenly stopped working on Youtube because Google likes to lick Youtube's greedy greasy balls when update to v3.9.4 of FVD came over night.


This is a little "workaround" which,, anybody with minor PC skills should pull of.


It's a perfectly legal torrent as it just contains Flash Video Downloader v3.9.3,, Youtube working, just as if YOU should have downloaded it through Firefox itself and set it to aoutoupdate OFF.


This torrent just contains a blanked Firefox profile with FVD 3.9.3 witch is set to Autoupdate OFF!! to stop it from updating to FVD 3.9.4, Googles BIG mistake (hmmm, one of them countless all they've made so far)


It's pretty simple,, just back up your old Profile in
C:UsersYOURNAMEAppDataRoamingMozillaFirefox
Then delete, start Firefox to make it create a new one, then just delete all the files in it and replace them with the files in the FILES folder in this torrent and Ta-da, you now have a new own unique profile with FVD v3.9.3.


Well, everything is explained in the HOW TO,, you can restore your bookmarks and whatever session (open tabs) you already have now, even restore your old profile if you mess up.


But read it well, any mistakes is YOUR own responsibility if you mess up, but it's so simple that you just should'nt.


Happy Youtube downloading again!!!
